ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Sons of Star Trek
ComicInfo.Summary: The final chapter! What do you get when you cross three of the Federation's most celebrated sons with a misguided god? An alternate reality full of lessons that may be just what the doctor ordered. But with Jake Sisko's enrollment in the Pennington School, Alexander Rozhenko's prison sentence, and Nog's first Starfleet posting all fast approaching, they'll have to move fast to defeat the Breen once and for all if they're to convince Q Jr. to return them to their home reality.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-03 19:00:46. [CVDB1062150]
ComicInfo.Characters: Alexander Rozhenko, Alyssa Ogawa, Beckett Mariner, Benjamin Sisko, Gul Dukat, Jadzia Dax, Jake Sisko, Kasidy Yates, Kira Nerys, Liam Shaw, Morn, Nog, Q, Q Junior, Quark, Sarah Sisko, Tuvix, Worf
ComicInfo.Teams: Avery Crew, Breen, Deep Space Nine Crew, Klingons, Starfleet
